name: Mykhailo Potseluiev
title: Senior Full‑Stack / Web Developer
description: Experienced Full-Stack developer with 5+ years of experience in developing modern web applications, mobile solutions, and blockchain projects. Specializing in JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystem: React, Next.js, Angular, Vue on the frontend and Node.js/Nest.js on the backend. Experienced with Rust, PHP, C, blockchain technologies (TON, Ethereum, ICP), ArcGIS, and Telegram Bot API. Working with REST/WebSocket APIs, Redux (Saga, Toolkit, Persist), Socket.IO, Express; databases — MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB. Expert in Material UI, Tailwind CSS, SCSS, CSS Modules, React Router, internationalization. Developing trading systems, arbitrage bots, financial services, e-commerce platforms, CRM systems, NFT games, and crypto trading solutions. Quickly learn new technologies and take responsibility for the technical quality of the product.

main: Material UI • Tailwind CSS • CSS Modules
Git • GitHub • REST API • WebSocket • Trading

education.title: NTU "KHPI" — Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
Yellow English Submarine — English B2 Level

experience.title: Self-Employed — Senior Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Development and delivery of innovative projects: NFT mobile game with scalable architecture and reward systems.
CRM system for small and medium businesses with subscription models, MySQL and AWS integration.
E-commerce platform Terra Mora for eco-friendly home goods with focus on UI/UX and React solutions.
Token presale platform on Next.js with secure payment processing.
Custom chatbots for technical analysis and crypto arbitrage in Telegram.
Blockchain solutions with smart contracts and payment systems on TON, Ethereum, and USDT.

experience.title: SmartyLab — Senior React Developer
responsibilities: Working with React (create-react-app and vite) for creating modern web applications.
State management with Redux and other state management solutions.
UI development with Material UI and Bootstrap for responsive interfaces.
Solving complex technical tasks and performance optimization.
Code review and mentoring junior developers.

experience.title: ОВБК Медія — Senior JS Developer | WEB Developer
responsibilities: Control of technical development and architectural planning.
Management of technical staff qualifications and code review.
Technical support of product development process and workflow optimization.
Quality control of technical tasks and implementation of best practices.
Working with React Native, Next.js, Express, Socket.io, MongoDB, PostgreSQL.

experience.title: Freelance — Senior Full-Stack | Web Developer
responsibilities: Development of full-featured web applications on React/Node.js stack using MERN stack.
Creating e-commerce platforms, CRM systems, Telegram bots, and web services.
Integration with external APIs and working with various databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL).
Development using Python for specific tasks and automation.
Working with clients and project management from idea to launch.

experience.title: Malyas — Middle Full-stack Developer
responsibilities: Development of web service for farmers based on ArcGIS with React+Node+PostgreSQL.
Integration with specialized APIs for obtaining field and farm data.
Working with geospatial data and cartography for the agricultural sector.
Creating interactive maps and agricultural data management system.

experience.title: Innovation Campus (NTU "KHPI") — Trainee → Middle Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Development of websites, bots, web applications using MERN stack and Python.
Learning and applying modern technologies: React, Vue, Node.js, Express, Socket.io.
Working with PostgreSQL databases and integration with various APIs.
Participation in team projects and hackathons for practical skills development.

extras: Writing clean, typed code using TypeScript and modern practices.
Experience working with blockchain technologies (TON, Ethereum, ICP, USDT) and smart contracts.
Specialization in developing trading systems, arbitrage bots, and financial services.
Expert in Rust for high-performance systems and blockchain development.
Experience with Telegram Bot API and creating custom chatbots.
Knowledge of ArcGIS for working with geospatial data and cartography.
Expert in financial services and real-time data (price tickers, trading).
Experience with PHP, C, and low-level programming.
Specialization in React ecosystem: Redux Saga, React Router, React Intl, CSS Modules.
Experience with Progressive Web Apps, Service Workers, and mobile solutions.
Proficient in Agile/Scrum methodologies and team collaboration experience.
Continuously learning new technologies and following development trends.
